I bought this as a work horse for my job. I'm a real estate appraiser and need a dependable camera that's easy to grab with one hand, light but not too small, takes great inside flash pics, and gets them right the 1st time. The wide angle, quick focus, flash and photo quality is perfect.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: the zoom ability is great. but it takes to long to focus... i dont know if it's the model or the camera i got. also... the battery needs charging way too often. I love the wide angle you get though... it's a very versatile as far as framing.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: easy set up, awesome clearity of zoom, zoom controls on both left and right
Cons: May find something as I use it more.
I have used many digital cameras over the last few years but I found this to be the most straight forward. I did not need to read the instructions to press the shutted, take a picture or review the picture. My husband who is not the most technological was also able to figure it out. I really like that there are controls for the zoom on both the left and right side of the camera. The detail and clearity of the zoom is awesome.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: great optical zoom, lots of options from full auto manual
Cons: No hot shoe, no RAW image files, fair viewfinder
The camera has good image stabilization, lots of setting options, good video, but difficult to hold such a light camera steady for video. Battery life is good. Picture quality is good, but a tripod helps with long zooms.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD; Great Zoom; Good Image Quality
Have had limited use of the camera over the last couple weeks with only approx 125 photos. Impression is great so far!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Its many features
Cons: Not having a manual to take with you.
With the manual on the computer I found it hard to remember all of the different things the camera could do. A field guide would be nice.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: Nothing
This camera is very easy to use. It takes great pictures and has so many options. It takes fabulous sports shots and distant shots. I would recommend this camera to everyone.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: The focus should be improved. 12.1 Megapixel &36x!
Item.Review:
Pros: Fancifulness
Cons: The Products of this camera ( Vedeos & Pictures) are not radiant for photo lovers and professionals!
The Optical Zoom Power is for vain. No all digital informations in magnified object.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use, picture/video quality, features
Cons: No internal memory so a card is a must
I wanted a point and shoot with more capability than the Sony Cybershot I've been using for the past several years. The 36X optical zoom is incredible! The HD video also incredible! This camera is very user friendly, so much so that my wife can use it. The tilt out preview screen at first didn't seem like a useful feature but I found myself taking advantage of it at my son's baseball games to angle it just right so the sun glare wasn't an issue.
I could go on but I'll sum it up by saying that this camera will not disappoint if you are just an average family guy (or girl) wanting a basic camera that is easy to use but has a lot of features. I would recommend a monopod. This w ... ill help steady the shot while zoomed in or capturing video. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great without being a digital SLR
Item.Review: Awesome range of choices in various conditions for the casual photographer. For those who want great pictures but do not want the size and weight of a full digital SLR camera. Love it and a great companion to my trusty pocket compact digital camera.[...] Thanks for supporting overseas military! B&H is a great resource for electronic products for military outside the US.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Good product. Good value for the money
Item.Review: * I use the product to take pictures of every special moment. * Great zoom. Good quality pictures. * The videos aren't so great for 1080P. They look dark in low lights.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: COOLPIX P500 Black 12.1 MP 36X Zoom Digital Camera
Item.Review: This camera takes very good pics. The zoom is awesome!! Borrowed this camera from my mother-n-law and carried it to Florida, and it made great pictures. The video on it is very good also. You can make the video go in slow motion. I'm in gonna invest in one of these cameras.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Cons: does not turn on easy and moving between functions is slow
The off and on switch does not work well. Switching between functions is a little difficult. The lens has already begun fade. I have had it for only a month. While it is a good camera, I would a year or so to buy it so that the bugs get worked out.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Battery life is better than any camera I've owned
I've had this camera going on 7 months and it now tells me "no files on card" whenever I take pictures. I have bought a new card thinking it was damaged but it does the same thing on the new card. I don't know what is wrong with it now. Any suggestions ?

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I bought P500 and the recommended San Disc 8g Extreme card because the camera has great specs and wanted I lighter camera than my DSLR for a trip to Europe. I tried the camera out on my grandchildren at a playground, but my shooting was interrupted numerous times by the Cannot use this card error. I had to stop shooting, remove the card and battery, and restart. Sometimes it worked, and sometimes it didn't. I would not recommend this camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: GOOD TECHNICAL SPECS. LIGHTWEIGHT. MANY PROGRAMS AND FACILITIES. BUT, POOR QUALITY CONTROL. I HAD TROUBLE WITH THE BATTERY NOT CONNECTING PROPERLY WITH THE ELECTRIC CICUITRY. SOMETIMES, REMOVING AND REPLACING IT WOULD SOLVE THE PROBLEM, OTHER TIMES IT WOULD NOT!! I HESITATE BETWEEN HAVING THE CAMERA REPLACED OR GETTING A REFUND

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: COOLPIXP500BK - Nikon COOLPIX P500 Black 12.1 Megapixel Digital Camera review
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom,Tilting LCD,Easy To Use,Night Scene,Good in Low Light,Small / Compact,Good Image Quality,Large Clear LCD,Good Image Stabilization,Short Lag Time,Fast/accurate auto-focus
I have only had this camera 3 weeks, and it is the one I reach for, over the other camera's I own. My main use is wild life photography

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Very good value for money. Users made a critic concerning a bug card not readable. I had the same problem. Sometimes the camera (when i went on standby) said that the memory card was not readable anymore. You can easily solve the issue while formatting the card in your camera. Otherwise the cam is a little jewel

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Wonderful camera. I had to wait for 3 weeks from somebody to bring me the camera from USA to Israel and i had read a lot of comments about it in ths period of time. The bottom line is that you must to fill it in your hands and not to read articles. I am impresed about this camera. Its so easy to use it for pictures and video. I am regular user not a pro and for me is a big jump from my old Fuji to this camera. Great ..great camera. Of course are same bad thigs like slow autofocus while zooming in video (1-2 sec) , the noise of the zoom and the lens cap that you MUST remove before you press ON.You cannot use filters also but for me is not relevant. A big minus ( for me ) is that you can not use an external flash . An external flash is a MUST for cameras likes this. Bottom line BUY IT ...

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: When traveling to new places, we always take this camera. It has got an amazing zoom and doesn't lose picture quality on high zoom. Its quite quick and fps is pretty good for the money paid for the camera. I don't really see anything bad with the camera unless I compare it with high-end Nikon(s).

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: East to Use, Action Shots
Cons: Haven't found anything yet!
I purchased this camera primarily for my son's TBall games. I wanted a camera that takes good action shots without paying a hefty price. This camera is IT!! I love the action shots I got of my son playing the infield, running the bases and batting. It's a great camera for the price! I'm still experimenting with it, and can't wait to find out what else it can do. So far so good. Easy to use, and great quality pictures.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I have been using Nikon cameras for over fifty years, since before anything automatic was common, and before digital was thought of. They still make solid products, well built as cameras, not just digital gadgets. This camera is made for taking pictures by people who know photography, but still can be used by novices. They can take pictures, but will never use most of its capability. Full manual control, combined with automatic control of shutter or apperture give you the ability to optimize high speed action or blur background or nearby objects. It has the ability to take a lot of almost identical pictures and keep the best one, take a series of various exposures and combine them to give you exposure lattitude to kill for!And it has an unbelievable number of digital goodies that I ma ... y never get around to exploring.But; The fantastic ability to take still pictures in low light is not available when you shoot video.It sometimes takes a lot of time to do it's digital magic, blacking out while you miss that good shot that happened immediately after the last one.And its image stabilization is nowhere as good as in my last Nikon, much less most camcorders today.And of course, with that unbelievable zoom range, a tripod is a necessity when you reach out a long way. And it reaches out a looooong way!It is still a Nikon, and well worth the name. It is by far the most camera for the money I have ever used. But I'll be a sucker for a new one in a couple of years.I have no commercial ties to anyone. This is my opinion and mine alone.Robert Ted Wrightrtwright[@] expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Its excellent for people learning the basics of photography and serious amateurs too. In fact I know many profesional photographers who bought one, because its good quality and powerful zoom

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This is the perfect little camera when I simply wish to walk around, or take snapshots. I like the versatility of looking through the viewfinder, or the large LCD screen. It is light, compact, and more importantly, useful.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: It does what you expect it to do.
Item.Review: I have had several digital cameras and found this nikon more user friendly. I still miss the picture editing capability I had on my Sony, but don't miss Sony in general.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: for the lens alone this camera is amazing.. No, it is no DSLR, but in good light it is hard to notice and if you control your lighting,..WOW. super sharp LCD, I bought refirbished...great band for the buck...amazing technology

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Low light
Cons: Clearity horrible
Unfortuately I brought the P500 before going on vacation and did not use it prior. I have always beena Sony person and this was my first Nikon product. To sum it up. Horrible pictures, terrible hispeed at our son's soccer game. What a waste. I returned it to Best Buy and got the Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-HX100V. Absolutely superb in every aspect to the Nikon.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I have never used a good quality camera before. I was worried that it might be too complicated for a beginner. But no problem. It is simple yet has amazing zoom and so easy to learn the features.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Perfect for taking close up pictures of the many birds I encounter while walking my dogs every morning. I was never able to get good pictures of the eagles with my other camera. Now I can zoom in and get the best pictures ever! I walk every morning on the levy along the river and/or on the beach. Nature has so much to offer with its many animals, and I'm always ready with my camera to bring them up close and personal for some really awesome pictures. I am very happy with this camera!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: COOLPIX P500 Black 12.1 MP 36X Zoom Digital Camera
Item.Review: The camera is user friendly. it has a number of different settings for great picts, once you've gotten the hang of using it(settings)you will have the best collection of memories.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Short Lag Time; Great Zoom; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Stabilization; Nice Body Color; Good in Low Light; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use
We were looking for something with a fast shutter speed, but didn't want to spend the $$ on an SLR. This is perfect for us. Many people have already commented on what amazing photos the camera takes!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast/accurate auto-focus; Great Zoom; Short Lag Time; Good Image Quality; Nice Body Color; Good Image Stabilization; Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Easy To Use
I purchased this camera for my daughter for Christmas. She really likes the camera and operates it with ease. Great camera for a teen. The picture quality is good.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: if it only had an optical viewfinder
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Great Zoom; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Quality; Very advanced
Cons: Requires serious learning
wide variety of settings that you will need to study if you want to use its capabilities. Picture quality is superb.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Great Zoom; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Nice Body Color; Short Lag Time; Small / Compact; Good Image Stabilization; Large Clear LCD
wonderful camera, great price. We are still learning how to use the numerous features available on this camera

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I really want to like this camera, but..
Item.Review: Knowing this is no DSLR, I had my expectations in line, but the P500 disappoints in a couple of places that are dear to me. While the HD movies look very good, 1) you can hear the autofocus noise in the recording and 2) they put the mics on top of the camera instead of on the front, so the sound is awful. Also, that long zoom is tempting to use but makes it nearly impossible to focus on your subject unless you are using a tripod or monopod. The photo quality could be better, but that's what happens when a lens can do it all - everything is a trade-off, but I wish I hadn't spent the money since I can't stand to use the camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This camera is so picky. At times the pictures come out great, but other times they are blurry. I've had the camera for only a year, but I'm already looking to replace it. I HATE this camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Perfect; Easy To Use; Good Image Quality; Great Zoom; Good in Low Light; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Nice Body Color; Large Clear LCD; Short Lag Time; Good Image Stabilization
Cons: NO MANUAL
only draw back is reading the 200+ page manual on the computer (disc). Just a fun camera, that takes excellent pictures

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: If you do one thing buy this camera
Item.Review: I love this camera & cant put it down. It's so easy to versative & easy ot use. Great product & modestly priced. Very suitable for beginners as well as experienced snappers. Great quality pictures. Strongly recommended.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great camera very good tele-photo lens.
Item.Review: I like the camera's ability to go from 24mm to well over 800mm,one lens for all type of shooting. My only complaint is that the camera does not have the ability to screw a UV filter in order to protect the actual camera lens. I found an attachment for around $27 that mounts onto the P500 and am using an UV filter with this attachment, however this limits the camera for use from around 32mm, anything closer I end up having a picture that looks like it was shot from a ship's telescope.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P500 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: The Electronic viewfinder has a really gritty texturized look to it that makes it hard to see the subject. BUT worst of all the light meter scale is useless. The scale is yellow and white so when you adjust your exposure you can barely see which way you are exposing due to the fact the yellow and white are so close in value. Red, green, black any color with contrast would be better.
